title: Race Driver Grid v1.3 + DLCs (English/Spanish)
description:
Race Driver Grid 1.3 + DLCs, just install and play.
 
 
This DVD-5 version contains:

- Integrated all the updates up to the 1.3.
- The game in English and Spanish.
- DLCs "8-Ball" and "Prestige".
- All the necessary single/multi player files.
- Every car and race unlocked.
- A guide and a trainer.
- The needed libraries to play.
- Every resolution unlocked, so you can play in 1920*1080p.
 
 
8-Ball pack adds:
 
- McLaren F1 GTR (see image at the bottom as proof)
- TVR Cerbera Speed 12
- Mitsubishi 2.0 Turbo Lancer Evolution X
- Honda S2000
- Nissan GTR GT500
- VW Nardo
- Pontiac Firebird Trans AM
- Volvo C30 Green Racing
 
 
Prestige pack adds:
 
- Mount Panorama Circuit in Bathurst, Australia
- Lamborghini Gallardo GT
- Lamborghini Gallardo LP560-4
- Mazda Furai
- Mercedes SLR McLaren 722
- Honda Integra Type-R (DC5)
- Lotus 2-Eleven
- Bugatti Veyron (see image at the bottom as proof)
- Jaguar XKR GT3
- Ferrari F430 GTC
- Ferrari F575 GTC
